SEARCH
Package com.example.seaSideEscape.service

Class ReservationService

java.lang.Object
com.example.seaSideEscape.service.ReservationService
@Service public class ReservationService extends Object
Service class for managing reservations in the SeaSide Escape application. Provides functionality for creating, booking, and managing reservations and their associated rooms.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReservationService

      @Autowired public ReservationService(ReservationRepository reservationRepository, BillingService billingService, RoomService roomService, AccountService accountService, BookingService bookingService, AccountRepository accountRepository)
      Constructs a new ReservationService.
      Parameters:
      reservationRepository - the repository for managing reservations
      billingService - the service for managing billing operations
      roomService - the service for managing rooms
      accountService - the service for managing accounts
      bookingService - the service for managing bookings
      accountRepository - the repository for managing account entities

  • Method Details

    • bookReservation

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> bookReservation(String username) throws Exception
      Books a reservation for a given user. Marks the user's unbooked reservation as booked and saves the updated information.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account making the reservation
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a success or error message
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the booking process

    • createReservation

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createReservation(LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate, String username) throws Exception
      Creates a new reservation for a given user.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the start date of the reservation
      checkOutDate - the end date of the reservation
      username - the username of the account creating the reservation
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a success or error message
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the reservation creation process

    • addRoom

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addRoom(Room room, String username) throws Exception
      Adds a room to the user's unbooked reservation. Ensures the room is available for the specified check-in and check-out dates.
      Parameters:
      room - the room to be added to the reservation
      username - the username of the account adding the room
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a success or error message
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the room addition process
